Spring.Core
===========

These are the binaries of Spring.Core, to be used as dependencies.

These files are released under the Apache License v2.

The files are from Spring.NET 1.3.1, downloaded from
<http://www.springframework.net/download.html>,
in [bin\net\2.0\].
Since we are still on .net 3.5, it is the 2.0 files we need to use.


Common.Logging
==============

Spring.Core depends on Common.Logging.
Common.Logging is added next to Spring.Core.

Version 1.2.0 from Common.Logging is used, downloaded from
<http://netcommon.sourceforge.net>.

Common.Logging is released under the Apache License v2.
